storyInfo: The extent of the mysterious recoveries turns out to be greater than Hibiscus foresaw, and the street is filled with uncertain rumors, linking a Sarkaz with calamity. Hibiscus is forced to confront the crowd besieging her.

attributes.content: Huff...
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: It didn't go so well with Mr. Czerny, but everyone else in the Afterglow has been nice and easy to talk with.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: I've visited ten or so houses by now, and picked up a few blood samples. Not bad results.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: It's almost night now...
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Junge Frau, I've seen you busy all day long, running to and fro. I bet you're hungry, aren't you?
attributes.name: Food Stall Owner

attributes.content: How about trying some Afterglow specialties?
attributes.name: Food Stall Owner

attributes.content: Specialties?
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Take a look at this. Pan-fried sauerkraut! The aroma, the color!
attributes.name: Food Stall Owner

attributes.content: (A pickled food sautéed in oil. The very opposite of healthy.)
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: What, scared I'm overcharging you? Here, this one's yours, free of charge!
attributes.name: Food Stall Owner

attributes.content: Don't be shy, now, you've been all over the streets checking up on us. This is to thank you.
attributes.name: Food Stall Owner

attributes.content: (Oh, I can't turn down hospitality...)
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Thank you very much, then.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Don't mention it!
attributes.name: Food Stall Owner

attributes.content: What's wrong? You've only taken one bite. I told you, it's on the house.
attributes.name: Food Stall Owner

attributes.content: I'm not quite hungry—I'll carry on eating later.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Actually, have you ever considered adjusting your recipe slightly?
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: In what way?
attributes.name: Food Stall Owner

attributes.content: You see, this serving is approximately that of an adult's, but the salt and fat content are at least three and five times the recommended intake respectively. It's more harmful than anything.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Junge Frau, I've been making this for decades. There's no one buying it who doesn't like it.
attributes.name: Food Stall Owner

attributes.content: If I suddenly changed my recipe, my regulars would have my head!
attributes.name: Food Stall Owner

attributes.content: I'm suggesting it with their health in mind.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Everyone spending their money here, myself included, is an Infected. A diet so high in salt and fat can only have even worse repercussions on Infected than on the healthy...
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: I'll just ask you this one thing—does my food taste good or not?
attributes.name: Food Stall Owner

attributes.content: It's extremely delicious.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Then that settles it!
attributes.name: Food Stall Owner

attributes.content: But I still think—
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Alright, alright. I know you can't appreciate my craft, I get it. My heart goes out to you.
attributes.name: Food Stall Owner

attributes.content: Haha...
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Oh, by the way, I'd like to ask a few questions. Can I?
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Seeing as business isn't exactly booming right now, ask away.
attributes.name: Food Stall Owner

attributes.content: Well, why don't you tell me how business has been lately?
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Up to my ears! More and more people out to eat the past few days, probably thanks to the warm weather.
attributes.name: Food Stall Owner

attributes.content: Are you familiar with everyone who comes to eat?
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: I am. Every patron of mine's from the Afterglow. I know basically all of them.
attributes.name: Food Stall Owner

attributes.content: Are they all Infected?
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: They are.
attributes.name: Food Stall Owner

attributes.content: Have there been any who hadn't shown themselves for a while, but came to buy from you again these past few days?
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: That's right. Quite a few too, if I think about it.
attributes.name: Food Stall Owner

attributes.content: Could I ask you to tell me which of your customers that applies to? Where do they all live?
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Thank you!
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: No problem!
attributes.name: Food Stall Owner

attributes.content: Finally... how have you been feeling recently?
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: You mean the Oripathy? Fairly regular, nothing one way or the other. But with business good lately, I've been really on top of keeping my stocks up.
attributes.name: Food Stall Owner

attributes.content: I'm guessing you're not too obsessed with music?
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Heh, I've never been much of an artist. Don't have as much drive as them. If I can keep my family fed, I'm happy.
attributes.name: Food Stall Owner

attributes.content: That's all my questioning, then.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Thank you for humoring me! I hope business thrives for you!
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Thank you, thank you.
attributes.name: Food Stall Owner

attributes.content: But you've still only taken one bite, Junge Frau. Won't you have a little more?
attributes.name: Food Stall Owner

attributes.content: Well—didn't I just—
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: I'm joking.
attributes.name: Food Stall Owner

attributes.content: You doctors put health first, I understand that! But naturally, taste's a priority for us chefs, and doctors by and large, well, they give us some understanding back. What do you say?
attributes.name: Food Stall Owner

attributes.content: Erm... I can understand, but I still can't approve.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Just understanding's a good start. We can put our differences aside. Next time you want a bite, remember, come by!
attributes.name: Food Stall Owner

attributes.content: Mmhm, mmhm.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: She has me wondering, though. Seemed on the verge of tears after she took one bite...
attributes.name: Food Stall Owner

attributes.content: *sigh* Such a nice young girl. Makes you wonder why she had to be a Sarkaz.
attributes.name: Food Stall Owner

attributes.content: Chefkoch, one thing of sauerkraut, please.
attributes.name: Coffee Shop Owner

attributes.content: Coming up—oh, it's you.
attributes.name: Food Stall Owner

attributes.content: Two portions of minced meat and a slight char on your sauerkraut, yeah?
attributes.name: Food Stall Owner

attributes.content: Thank you!
attributes.name: Coffee Shop Owner

attributes.content: That girl just now looked a little strange. You seen her before?
attributes.name: Coffee Shop Owner

attributes.content: She's been all around the streets lately. If I didn't before, I have now. What, are you going to invite her to yours for a cup?
attributes.name: Food Stall Owner

attributes.content: Forget it.
attributes.name: Coffee Shop Owner

attributes.content: You've seen how she's so busy. Probably on some serious business, no chance to have a coffee.
attributes.name: Coffee Shop Owner

attributes.content: Cases with abnormal improvement are distributed over an even wider area than I guessed...
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: I'm sorry!
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: That's alright, I should be the one apologizing. I was so preoccupied, admiring this magnificent building, I got in the way of your motif.
...Motif?
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Goodbye.

attributes.name: Hibiscus
attributes.content: Good——

attributes.name: Hibiscus
attributes.content: bye...
(She's in a hurry...)
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: (Though I suppose it's about time to head back. There's no residents in the square...)
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Hey, fräulein!
attributes.name: Drunken Infected

attributes.content: Um?
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: (What a strong smell of alcohol...)
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Yeah, you, devil!
attributes.name: Drunken Infected

attributes.content: And you are...?
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: You just left my house! You don't remember?
attributes.name: Drunken Infected

attributes.content: So, you're a relative of Mr. Schneider's? You didn't seem to be at home when I made my visit just now.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: I'm his son! You sucked my father's blood!
attributes.name: Drunken Infected

attributes.content: Hibiscus! Hibiscus!
attributes.name: Andante

attributes.content: Andante, not a moment too late. This man here's extremely worked up, and I don't know what he's trying to convey...
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Andante? Andante from Rhodes Island! Go tell your boss right now, to send this devil back home, never let her back in the Afterglow!
attributes.name: Drunken Infected

attributes.content: That... Just calm down for now. Tell me what she did. It helps me write my report afterward.
attributes.name: Andante

attributes.content: (Whisper) I was wondering why you were taking so long to return... head back to the branch office for now!
attributes.name: Andante

attributes.content: (Whisper) I'll observe a little longer. Something's not right here. Maybe what he says can help us out somehow.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: She sucked my father's blood! Devil! Bloodsucker! You know what that means?
attributes.name: Drunken Infected

attributes.content: Er, Mr. Schneider, you may have heard legends about Vampires, but I'm just an ordinary Sarkaz. Fresh blood has no attractive force on me...
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Who said anything about Vampires?
attributes.name: Drunken Infected

attributes.content: Hey, buddy. What do you say? What's she doing... collecting blood from Infected?
attributes.name: Drunken Infected

attributes.content: Me?
attributes.name: Passerby Infected

attributes.content: Yeah, you! G—Go on!
attributes.name: Drunken Infected

attributes.content: I... I'm busy right now, excuse me...
attributes.name: Passerby Infected

attributes.content: Gah, some people got no spine...
attributes.name: Drunken Infected

attributes.content: Bro, you—you tell me!
attributes.name: Drunken Infected

attributes.content: Well... I'm not too sure of the details, but I have heard about Casters using Infected blood to do their Arts.
attributes.name: Suspicious Infected

attributes.content: And the Spire Casters secretly abducting Infected lately. They're doing about the same thing...
attributes.name: Suspicious Infected

attributes.content: That's what I want to hear! This devil's been collecting our blood from all over! That shit's exactly what she's doing!
attributes.name: Drunken Infected

attributes.content: Collecting the blood of Infected for Arts... Based on what I know, nothing apart from the, um, quote-unquote 'Witch King's remains'...
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Hibiscus's mindless utterance stuns not just the two Infected into silence, but the entire crowd about them who gathered to see what the fuss was about.
You'd... utter the Majesty's name just like that... You really are... all tied up.
attributes.name: Suspicious Infected

attributes.content: That's it, she has to be! It's what the prophecy said! This devil's going to use Infected blood to blast us all with Arts!
attributes.name: Drunken Infected

attributes.content: Prophecy? You mean the one His Majesty issued...
attributes.name: Suspicious Infected

attributes.content: Right! That one! We can't let that prophecy come true!
attributes.name: Drunken Infected

attributes.content: Did you say prophecy?
attributes.name: Meddlesome Infected

attributes.content: I heard there was a prophecy recently, but it was all vague... what did it say, exactly?
attributes.name: Meddlesome Infected

attributes.content: I'm just as curious. You're trying to drive me off based on some prophecy, but I don't even know anything about it. How do you expect me to go, just like that?
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: We can't just talk about it out loud. Who can guarantee he didn't leave behind some kind of Arts? Maybe our each and every move is all...
attributes.name: Suspicious Infected

attributes.content: Eek!
attributes.name: Meddlesome Infected

attributes.content: Th-Th-Th... Then tell us quietly. What exactly did the prophecy say?
attributes.name: Meddlesome Infected

attributes.content: Tch.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: (Whisper) Andante, have you heard similar rumors recently?
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: (Whisper) It rings a faint bell, to be honest, but I never paid any attention to it...
attributes.name: Andante

attributes.content: (Whisper) Not to mention His Majesty died long ago. And even if he were alive and well, he'd have no reason to leave any prophecies specifically in the Afterglow.
attributes.name: Andante

attributes.content: (Whisper) People just keep coming...
attributes.name: Andante

attributes.content: Girlie, I think you should take a hike. There's everything to fear here...
attributes.name: Meddlesome Infected

attributes.content: Get out of the Afterglow!
attributes.name: Drunken Infected

attributes.content: Please, everyone, don't just trust an unfounded rumor like this!
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Rumor?! You have the gall to call a prophecy a 'rumor,' you...
attributes.name: Suspicious Infected

attributes.content: Sir, one moment you saying me and the Wi... those remains are 'all tied up,' the next you're suggesting I'm disrespecting him. What exactly are you trying to get at with all these contradictions? What are you inciting?
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: The way your sort behave, common sense never applies.
attributes.name: Suspicious Infected

attributes.content: Besides, who knows what a devil like you is up to, coming here to the Afterglow and using your 'investigation' as a cover to steal our blood.
attributes.name: Suspicious Infected

attributes.content: Even if you *mean* no harm, we can't just ignore the prophecy and let you stay here! Isn't that right, everyone?
attributes.name: Suspicious Infected

attributes.content: Yeah! That's right!
attributes.name: Onlooking Infected

attributes.content: I'm not sure why you all seem so scared of a fictional calamity taking place here. It's probably 'His Majesty's' name hanging over you?
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: But there's something that scares me more.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: I'm scared I won't be able to find an explanation for this incident.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: If I cower now, then maybe I'd be losing a golden chance to save lives; maybe, I'd leave you all to be endangered just because of my own cowardice.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: You can look at me like a cruel caster using Infected blood for Arts, you can treat me like some 'devil' spreading disaster... I don't mind any of it.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: I just want to save lives. Beyond that, I'm not asking the Afterglow for anything else.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: No more lies! If you don't go, you're here to destroy the Afterglow!
attributes.name: Drunken Infected

attributes.content: Everybody, I don't intend to start a conflict with you here.
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: If you truly want me out of sight, I can return to the Rhodes Island branch office for a time, and you can all cool down in the meanwhile. Would that be okay?
attributes.name: Hibiscus

attributes.content: Pssh, now you're talking reason—
attributes.name: Drunken Infected

attributes.content: No!
attributes.name: Suspicious Infected

attributes.content: Where do you think the Rhodes office is? It's here in the Afterglow too!
attributes.name: Suspicious Infected

attributes.content: Or do you think Rhodes Island has some special privilege, huh? That you can just take it out of the Afterglow's hands?
attributes.name: Suspicious Infected

attributes.content: We won't let that happen!
attributes.name: Suspicious Infected

attributes.content: Everyone with me! Drive this devil away!
attributes.name: Suspicious Infected

attributes.content: Some come charging in, some stay motionless where they are, and some choose to turn their backs on Hibiscus, leaving this site of trouble.
No matter the choice they've made, Hibiscus simply stands there, not choosing to fight, nor choosing to flee.
